original_text: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,
korean_text: 기도 후에 일어나 제자들에게 가서 슬픔으로 인하여 잠든 것을 보시고

sentences.original_text: And when he rose up from prayer,
and was come to his disciples,
he found them sleeping for sorrow,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 슬픔 때문에 자고 있는 것을 발견했다.
